name: Registration Notification Template
description: Prompt  users to activate their account.
subject: Please activate your account
body:
Dear {{firstname}}:

You have been registered to take a survey.

Please activate your account so you can login and complete your profile.

You will be asked for your activation code: {{activationcode}}

Regards

name: Password Change Notification Template
description: Prompt users to change their password.
subject: Please change your password
body:
Dear {{firstname}}:

You have requested a password change.

Please use the following activation code to change your password.

Your new activation code is: {{activationcode}}

Regards
